title: The Reformation
itunes:title: The Reformation
itunes:subtitle: As we approach the 500th anniversary of the Reformation, Professor Eamon Duffy joins us to discuss some of the big questions about the religious upheavals that altered the course of English and European history.  See acast.com/privacy for...
description:
As we approach the 500th anniversary of the Reformation, Professor Eamon Duffy joins us to discuss some of the big questions about the religious upheavals that altered the course of English and European history.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
